actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three Psychic Strikes. If it hits one creature with two Psychic Strikes target: DC 16 Int save or stunned until end of its next turn.

actions.name: Psychic Strike
actions.desc: Melee or Ranged Spell Attack: +8 to hit 5 ft. or range 60' one target 18 (4d6+4) psychic.

actions.name: Brain Storm (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Brutal psychic force wracks foes' psyches. Each creature within 30' of it: 31 (9d6) psychic and poisoned 1 min (DC 16 Int half damage not poisoned). A poisoned creature can re-save at end of each of its turns success ends effect on itself.

actions.name: Spellcasting (Psionics)
actions.desc: Cha (DC 16) no spell components: At will: detect thoughts mage hand (hand invisible) thaumaturgy3/day ea: charm person suggestion1/day ea: levitate telekinesis

special_abilities.name: Impenetrable Ego
special_abilities.desc: While it is conscious and wearing no armor and wielding no shield it adds its Cha modifier to its AC (included above) and saves. Advantage on saves vs. being charmed or frightened.
